extendedInfo.description: Colors! for Galaxy Note is a simple and fun painting application tailored for Samsung's Galaxy Note. With its simple but robust tools, it allows for artists of all stripes to easily create and share. It also features integration with the Colors! Gallery, where you can learn from other artists by watching their painting playbacks, or receive feedback on your own.

reviews.title: Nice, needs some improvements though
reviews.comment: This is a nifty little program. I like how you can play back your drawing. However, pressing the \"back\" button does not let you completely exit the app. Would alsobr nice to be able to export the video, or upload to YouTube or Facebook directly.
reviews.author: Janda Tithia

reviews.title: Its so beautiful
reviews.comment: NUR  ALYA  DAYANA  UMUR : 9 TAHUN NAMA PANGGILLAN : YAYA
reviews.author: Elya Susanti

reviews.title: Love colors! but get the original one.
reviews.comment: I am in love with colors! since nDS. took me ages to find the Android app! The standard version of this app has good pressure recognition when you switch it on. this one seems a bit gimmicky.
reviews.author: Jenna Downing

reviews.title: Galaxy note
reviews.comment: Pretty good app wool rate 5 stars if you could change the opacity on all of the brushes...also have a better way to get to the undo redo other than those 2 things everything is great and I would definitely buy it if it had those 2 things..thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: With this app I can use my note as a digital sketchbook and upload the sketches to my dropbox. Its perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: two steps away from being the best drawing app
reviews.comment: Hi, I know the s-pen challenge it\'s over and probably you are devoting most of the time to other platforms. However, do you think is possible to just add a color picker to the Galaxy note version. That will make the program quite usable while we are waiting for brush opacity to be implemented at a later date.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: I\'m glad you\'re suppprting Galaxy Note. It would be really nice to have a more convenient undo button, or at least a color picker.   Also, I seem to have problems uploading my drawings. Help, please?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I really love this app.  i would love to see layers added in if thats possible.  also a \"save as you go\" feature would be good.  i was working on a drawing for 30 minutes when it suddenly became unresponsive. Also sometime it wont zoom in and out.  Also i wish the back and forward options were easier to get to...since i use them a LOT! :) but i highly recommend this app! Great interface. great brushes!  Hope it gets updates!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: The way that the format is laid out is very convenient, having the pens and color in one place makes it very easy to make quick changes, but i didn\'t like how the undo clear buttons are on a different tab. The drawing is responsive and fluid, and this is a good app for detailed art or just doodling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i have been waiting for this!
reviews.comment: awesome!  finally my favorite homebrew for the DS and iphone comes to Android!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please don\'t stop working on it ~
reviews.comment: Really great! I got your app on all the platforms it\'s on :D   I wish you would add a colour picker and more opacity settings it would be amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A little Improvement needed...
reviews.comment: Nice App but needs a few things like: need to put option to undo on the Screen you are actually painting on, and a way to Calibrate the pen because it marks to far away from where it touches Screen.  Galaxy Note
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ICS
reviews.comment: No longer compatible after update to 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: Plus Color picker to the new update and this app will be the best painting app for android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice drawing tool
reviews.comment: Bottom left and right icon are barely visible. It took me a while to figure out there is so much more I can do with the app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paintman
reviews.comment: Great app I am a painter ani love using this app.
reviews.author: Ron Burnett
